name: Roguelike Shooter Prototype
description:
A prototype of a top-down roguelike shooter I made in 2019.

Includes random level generation with 5 enemies, 6 different rooms and player upgrades. Unfortunately, there's no way to continue after "clearing" a floor, so playthroughs are short.

Might continue at some point? For now, I threw it up here because it's actually worth sharing.
